SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASK VALUES ((SELECT ID_MAX FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ID)+1, 1) AS ID_MAX FROM TASK) A), #{title}, #{content}, #{hashtag}, 0, NOW(), DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s"), DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s"), #{priority})
